email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a vessel, MV Ocean Star, available for this route. She’s a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high compared to the current market. Would you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $51.25 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. We can agree to $51.25 per metric ton, provided the laycan remains firm. Please confirm the vessel’s availability and send over the charter party for review. Also, could you clarify the laytime calculation? Regards, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that. The laycan is confirmed for October 15-20, and MV Ocean Star is fully available. Laytime is 72 hours total, with 24 hours for loading and 48 hours for discharge. I’ll send the charter party draft shortly. Let me know if you need any further details. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. The laytime terms are acceptable. Please proceed with the charter party draft, and we’ll review it promptly. Looking forward to finalizing this. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve attached the charter party draft for your review. Let me know if there are any amendments needed. Once confirmed, we can proceed with the fixture. Thanks for your cooperation, and I look forward to working with you on this shipment. Best regards, Sarah.
